item.title: Yet Another Instance of DoW-Loop
item.description: Just got another DoW-Loop example from SAS Sample #48582: http://support.sas.com/kb/48/582.html

item.title: SAS Snippet: Reshape Data Using SAS DoW Loop (From Long to Wide)
DoW-Loop: A Quick Note from SESUG 2012
item.description: Once upon a midnight dreary, While I pondered, weak and weary, Over many a quaint and curious Volume of SAS-L galore, While I coded, nearly snapping, Suddenly there came a tapping As of someone gently wrapping Code around my mental core. “’Tis’ Do-Whitlock Loop”, I muttered, “Wrapped around my brain core” – This it was, and so much more!
